```{r}

library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
#| fig-width: 15
df %>% 
  mutate(jumlah = as.numeric(jumlah)) %>% 
  filter(grepl("(UN)",entity,fixed = T)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = year,y = jumlah)) +
  geom_col() +
  facet_wrap(~entity,scales = "free")

```
